p: The PRV MinA strain was maintained at the Animal Food Safety Key Laboratory (Henan Province, China) [ 23, 24]. Swine testicle cells were kindly gifted by Dr. Zhanyong Wei (Henan Agricultural University, China). The cells were cultured with RPMI 1640 medium with 10% fetal bovine serum (HyClone, UT, USA), 100 U/mL penicillin, and 100 U/mL streptomycin (HyClone, UT, USA) at 37 °C with 5% CO 2.
